DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine prevalence psychological affection infertile egyptian woman
DOC.brief_title: Psychological Profile Women With Infertility Egypt : A Comparative Study
DOC.criteria: Control group : Pregnant woman . At least one live birth . Age group 2040 year . Clinical group : Infertile woman either primary secondary accord ( WHO,2013 ) . Age group 2040ys . Different level education . Different method treatment infertility ( medical IVF ) Half rural area half urban area . Male factor infertility . The woman psychiatric disorder . The woman physical medical disorder . The woman whose current pregnancy problem ( e.g . growth retardation , macrosomia , placenta previa , threaten abortion , preterm labour ) . The woman history intrauterine fetal death .
